welcome_message_body: Welcome to Philadelphia, the city of brotherly love and rich American history! Explore our charming neighborhoods, iconic landmarks, and diverse culinary scene, and immerse yourself in all the cultural experiences this vibrant city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Honeygrow
restaurants.description: Honeygrow is a salad restaurant located in Philadelphia.
restaurants.address: 1601 N Broad St (Cecil B Moore Ave), Philadelphia, PA 19122

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Philadelphia Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at North Philadelphia Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at North Philadelphia Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic flights for American Airlines and American Eagle.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic flights for Delta Airlines and Delta Connection.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport, serving all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for private and charter flights at Trenton Mercer Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
